DIA_Caramon_Q602_Dead_03_01: It's you, Marvin... Those bastards hurt me pretty bad...
DIA_Caramon_Q602_Dead_03_02: I don't think I'm going to get out of this...
DIA_Caramon_Q602_Dead_Next_03_01: Here, I was... I was going to give you this once before... but I never got the chance...
DIA_Caramon_Q602_Dead_Goodbye_15_01: Caramon, you were a wonderful companion...
DIA_Caramon_Q602_Dead_Potions_15_01: It's going to be okay, I have some healing potions with me...
